cards.text: Plant a Tree or a Plant
cards.missionText: Gardening is a great moderate exercise that improves strength, flexibility, and mood. Science shows it reduces stress and boosts immune function.
cards.challengeText: Trees absorb carbon dioxide and release oxygen, combating climate change, improving air quality, and supporting biodiversity.
cards.lifeText: Planting fosters a sense of accomplishment and connection to nature. Research indicates it enhances mental well-being and life satisfaction.

cards.missionText: A tidy space reduces anxiety, improves focus, and enhances mental well-being. Plus, decluttering encourages physical activity, boosting cardiovascular health.
cards.challengeText: Donating items helps reduce waste and the demand for new products. Reusing and recycling conserve resources and decrease landfill waste.
cards.lifeText: Donating fosters community and purpose, enhancing personal happiness and social connections. A clutter-free space also boosts productivity and creativity.
